column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 長すぎる眠りに…
column4: I've been sleeping.

column3: 記憶がない
column4: I lost my memory.

column3: ミファー？
column4: Mipha who?

column3: 分からない
column4: Doesn't ring a bell.

column3: 準備した
column4: I'm ready!

column3: まだ準備してない
column4: Not yet.

column3: 思い出した
column4: I remember.

column3: 少しだけ…
column4: Just a bit...

column3: すみません…
column4: I'm so sorry...

column3: どうなったのでしょう？
column4: What happened?

column3: 分かった
column4: I'm ready.

column3: 本当にいいのか？
column4: Are you sure?

column3: 退魔の剣？
column4: What sword?

column3: 無くしたかも
column4: Perhaps.

column3: まかせろ
column4: I'm on it!

column3: もう一度聞かせて
column4: Come again?

column3: わかった！
column4: I'm in. Let's do this!

column3: 実は…
column4: I, um...

column3: ミファーを思い出した
column4: Mipha... I remember.

column3: もちろんだ！
column4: No problem!

column3: 一度撤退しよう
column4: Let's retreat.

column3: このまま続けよう
column4: Never surrender!

column3: ゼルダの声が聞こえた
column4: I heard Zelda's voice.

column3: ハイラル城で…
column4: Yes, in Hyrule Castle.

column3:
おおリンク！ よくぞ戻った！
待っておったゾヨ！
column4:
Link! You did well to survive your trial!
I have been awaiting your return!

column3:
あれほど猛威をふるった豪雨が嘘のように止み
この里の危機は消え去ったゾヨ ！
ハイラルの大地が水没する心配は
もうなくなったゾヨー！
column4:
The violent downpour has disappeared,
as has the threat to Zora's Domain!
It is all little more than a bad dream now.
Thanks to your efforts, there is no longer
any danger of a great flood laying waste
to Hyrule!

column3:
豪雨も止み神獣も戻った！
なんとめでたいゾヨ！
column4:
The heavy rains have stopped, and the
Divine Beast is our ally once again!

column3:
そういえばリンク
ソナタは退魔の剣を持っておらぬが…
かつての記憶と共に
退魔の剣もなくしたゾヨか？
column4:
By the way, Link. I see you are without
your trusty blade...the sword that seals
the darkness.
Did you perhaps lose it when you lost
your memory?

column3:
きっと このハイラルのどこかで
主が来るのを待っているにちがいないゾヨ
column4:
It is no doubt resting somewhere in
Hyrule even now...waiting for its
master to return.

column3:
ソナタが眠っておる間は
どこかで帰りを待っているはずゾヨ
column4:
It undoubtedly found a safe place
to wait for you...sleeping soundly,
just like its master.

column3:
そういえば あれも退魔の剣といったか…
迷いの森に名のある剣が眠ると聞く
ソナタが100年前に持っていた
退魔の剣そのものかどうかは知らぬゾラが…
行ってみるのも悪くない
迷いの森はここより西ハイラル城の北ゾラよ
column4:
Speaking of the sword that seals the
darkness... I hear that a legendary
blade now sleeps in the Lost Woods.
Mind that I cannot say with certainty
that it is the same blade you wielded
100 years ago.
Still, I advise you to go there and see it
for yourself. The Lost Woods are to
the west, north of Hyrule Castle.

column3:
リンク今回のソナタの働きには
ゾーラ一同心から感謝するゾヨ！
column4:
Link, all of the Zora thank you from the
depths of our hearts for your heroic
and selfless work!

column3:
お前がリンクと共に神獣と戦ったこと…
父親として誇りに思うゾヨ
知らぬ間に そんなにたくましくなりおって…
もう ワシの跡取りとして申し分ないゾヨ！
column4:
As your father, I am proud of you
for fighting the Divine Beast
alongside Link.
You have grown much recently. I know
you will be a worthy heir when your
time comes.

column3:
…とはいえ退魔の剣を持つソナタの事
あまり使う機会は ないかもしれんが…
その剣は ソナタにしか扱えぬ伝説の剣
くれぐれも大切にするのだゾヨ
column4:
Oh...but I see you already awakened the
sword that seals the darkness. Perhaps
you do not have need of this after all.
What you have there is a legendary blade
that only you can wield. You must take
great care of it.

column3: むぅ やはり忘れておったかゾヨ…
column4: Hm. So you have forgotten that as well...

column3: なんと！無くしてしもうたゾヨか！
column4: What? Is it truly lost?!

column3:
あれは英傑のリーダーである
ソナタにしか扱えぬ剣
column4:
That is a legendary blade that only you,
the Hylian Champion, can wield.

column3:
ソナタが眠っておる間は
どこかの森で帰りを待っているはずゾヨ
column4:
I expect it was awaiting your return while
you slept, resting in a sacred forest
or some such.

column3:
リンク！
ソナタには礼を渡さねばならぬゾヨ！
column4: Link! I must reward your efforts!

column3: …そして シド
column4: ...And you too, Sidon.

column3:
ソナタが水の神獣を鎮めてくれたおかげで
このゾーラの里は救われた！
期待以上の働きをしてくれた ソナタに
民を代表して心から感謝の意を示したいゾヨ！
column4:
You appeased the Divine Beast Vah Ruta
and thusly saved Zora's Domain!

We are all truly grateful! What you did
for us is more than we could have
ever expected of you.

column3:
さあ あの宝箱の中のものを受け取ってくれ

あれはミファーがずっと愛用していた
形見のようなものゾヨ…
友好の証として ソナタに持っていてほしい
そして どうかいつまでも大切に…
column4:
Now then! I implore you to collect the
treasure inside that chest over there.

It was cherished by Mipha. A memento
of sorts. I would like you to have it as
a token of our friendship.
Please take good care of it.

column3: ジャブフフフッ！
column4:
How glorious! Truly splendid!
Wah ha ha ha!

column3:
む？ その姿！
ソナタは… ハイリア人？
まさか息子 シドに頼まれてきてくれたゾヨか？
よくぞ ここまで来てくださった！
して…"息子のシドはどこにおるかの？
一緒に来たのではないゾヨか？
column4:
Hm? Well, I'll be!
Are you not...a Hylian?

By chance, did my son, Sidon, ask you
to come here? I am so glad you could
make it!
So then... Where is Sidon?
Did he not come with you?

column3:
おお ソナタは
ハイリア人ではないか？
column4: Ah. You are a Hylian, are you not?

column3:
おおっ
ソナタが シドの連れてきた ハイリア人？
column4:
Ah. You must be the Hylian that Sidon
brought here, correct?

column3:
ん？ ソナタの腰のモノ…
それはシーカーストーン？！
んん？よく見たらソナタ…
column4:
Hm? That object upon your waist...
is that not a Sheikah Slate?!

HMMM?!Now that I have gotten a good look
at you, it is all too clear who you are...

column3:
なんと！ どれだけ長き眠りに…
ワシのことを覚えとらん様子なのは そのせいか
column4:
Come again? Sleeping, you say...
Hm. Is that why you do not seem
to remember me?

column3: なんと！"記憶がないと？！
column4:
Come again? You say you have lost
your memory?

column3:
我が娘 ミファーのことは
覚えておるゾヨ？
column4:
But surely you must remember my
precious daughter, Mipha, yes?
You do, do you not?

column3:
まさかミファーのことも忘れてしまったと？

あんなに ソナタと仲のよかったミファーを
覚えておらんゾヨか？
この里の風景…
column4:
I cannot believe it... Have you truly
forgotten my dear Mipha as well?

You and Mipha were so close...
Yet you do not remember her?

Young hero... Please look upon the
beauty of Zora's Domain.

column3:
それにしても
知らずに英傑をつれてくるとは…
column4:
But first, it is worth noting how
remarkable it is that Sidon brought
a Champion here without realizing it!

column3:
実は今 この里は水の神獣ヴァ・ルッタのせいで
存亡の危機に見舞われておるゾヨ
単刀直入に言うと…
ワシらだけでは どうにもならんゾヨ！
ソナタの力貸してはくれまいか？
column4:
Now then. Hero...I must inform you that
Zora's Domain is in danger of vanishing
because of Divine Beast Vah Ruta.
I shall do you the courtesy of speaking
bluntly. We alone cannot stop this beast.

Will you lend us your strength?

column3:
ムズリ…
ゾーラのヒレ折れだなどと大げさなことを
column4:
Muzu, I expected more of you.
How can you still protest?

column3:
…リンク…ルッタは水の神獣…
無限に水を生み出す力を持っておるゾヨ
最近突然水を吹き上げ出したせいで
この辺りは激しい雨が続いている…
もともと我らゾーラにとって水は空気も同然
それだけなら困ることもなかったゾヨが…
東にある貯水湖が あふれそうなのだ！もし貯水湖が決壊してしまったら
この里はもちろん
川下に住む者達にも甚大な被害がでるゾヨ
column4:
...Link...Divine Beast Vah Ruta has great power.
It has the unique ability to create an
endless supply of water.
Of late it has been mercilessly spouting
water into the air. As a result, this area
has been plagued by heavy rains.
For us Zora, water and air are as one,
so you would not think this would be
quite so critical of a problem.
Sadly, the rains have filled the eastern
reservoir nearly to the point of flooding.If the reservoir bursts, as it soon will,
I fear immense damage will befall not
only Zora's Domain...
but also the area downstream from us.
There, Hylian lives are in very
grave danger.

column3:
リンク ありがとうゾヨ！

我らの目的が ほぼ同じとは
これも運命なのかもしれぬな
善は急げというゾヨ
ソナタに コレを受け取ってほしいゾヨ
column4:
Thank you, Link. Truly.
We are in your debt.

Our goal is the same. That means our
meeting was nothing short of destiny.

Now then, allow me to offer you this gift
as a show of faith.

column3:
むぅ…
また神獣が吠えておるゾヨ…
column4:
Hmm... The Divine Beast is crying out
once again...

column3:
水の神獣 ヴァ・ルッタ…ソナタらの姫 ゼルダ殿は厄災が現れる前に
神獣についても よく研究されておったゾヨ
ゼルダ殿の書かれた書物によれば
ルッタの肩に見える装置…
あれが電気によって
水を制御するカラクリらしいゾヨ
だが今は暴走して電気が流れておらんゾヨ
column4:
The Divine Beast Vah Ruta...Your princess, Zelda, often studied the
Divine Beasts. That is, in the time before
the Great Calamity.
According to her research, the orbs
located on Ruta's shoulders...

are mechanisms that can control
the water it generates. However,
they require electricity to work.
These orbs are clearly out of control
now because there is no electricity
coursing through to stop them.

column3:
そういえば…ルッタを鎮めるのに必要となる電気の矢を
ムズリに探しておくよう命じておいたが… 
出て行ってしまったゾヨ…
column4:
Hmm, but what shall we do now?I tasked Muzu with finding the
shock arrows we will need to
appease Vah Ruta.
But now he has rushed off in a huff...

column3:
何かのきっかけで
思い出す事も あるかもしれんゾヨ 
できれば…
column4:
Well, perhaps your memory will return
in time.

I dearly hope so.

column3:
そうゾヨ
リンクは紛れもなき英傑！
今はこの里が…いや"ハイラル全土が
水に呑まれるかもしれぬ危機的状況！
ここは ゾーラもハイリア人もない
謙虚に ヒレを畳む時ゾヨ
column4:
Indeed! Link is a Champion,
through and through.

As things now stand, Zora's Domain...Nay! Perhaps all of Hyrule...is doomed
to be swallowed by the sea.

This is bigger than all of us, my friend.
Zora and Hylians alike must put aside
our differences and band together.

column3: むぅ ムズリめ…あれは我が娘ミファーの教育係だったゾヨ
column4:
Hmph. That Muzu is not easily swayed
once his mind is set.You must understand... He was in charge
of educating my dear daughter, Mipha.

column3:
リンク
ムズリはおそらく下の広場にいるゾヨ
ソナタも行ってやってくれぬか…
説得には ソナタが必要ゾヨ
column4:
Link... Muzu is most likely at the
square down below.

Would you mind going down there?
I would like you to try to speak
with him.

column3: ハイリア人の英傑 リンクではないか！ワシを覚えておらんかの？！
column4: You are the Hylian Champion, Link!Do not tell me you have forgotten me...

column3:
ハイリア人の英傑リンクが今ここに！
まさしく驚くべき出来事ゾヨ！
それにしても懐かしい…
ホレかつて幾度も会ったであろう
命運が尽きたと聞いていたが
生きておったゾヨのう！
column4:
I cannot believe it. The Hylian Champion,
Link, has appeared before us... We have
met numerous times, I'll have you know.
Ah... So many memories! My mind is
overflowing with nostalgia, my friend.

I had heard a terrible rumor that you had
fallen in combat, but it appears you
managed to survive. Extraordinary!

column3:
シド･･･
アノ話をするつもりゾヨな･･･
column4:
Sidon... I suppose that means you are
going to tell him...

column3: おお そうよな…
column4: Oh? Yes, of course.

column3:
ポーチがいっぱいゾヨ
ゾーラの鎧を渡すのは ポーチを空けた後ゾヨな
column4:
Link, your pouch appears to be full.
Please make some space in there so
I may gift you this Zora armor.

column3:
リンク"ソナタも大変であろうが
ワシの話を聞いてほしい
column4:
Link, I doubt not that you have endured
a great many trials. Still, I must ask you
to hear my plea.

column3: シド"おまえも やるゾヨ！
column4: That is quite a feat, my boy!

column3:
それを着ていれば ハイリア人でも
我らゾーラのように滝登りができるゾヨ
どうか大切にな
column4:
So long as you wear this, you can
ascend waterfalls just like a Zora.

Please, take good care of it.

column3:
ミファーの像を見ても
何も思い出さんゾヨ？
column4:
Do you see that statue? Does gazing
upon Mipha's immortalized form still
not jog your memory?

column3:
ワシら肉親と同様に ミファーのことを
心底大切に思ってくれておるのだ
大厄災で ミファーを失ったとき
ハイリア人嫌いが決定的になってしまったゾヨ
ムズリの失礼を許してやってほしいゾヨ
column4:
Naturally, she means a lot to him...
just as she means the world to us.

Ever since we lost her to the Calamity,
he has grown to despise Hylians.

I hope you can forgive his rudeness.

column3:
ワシは ゾーラ族の王 ドレファンであるゾヨ
よくぞ ここまで来てくださった！
column4:
I am King Dorephan, ruler of the Zora.
You did well to come all the way here!

column3: よくぞ ここまで来てくださった！
column4: You did well to come all the way here!

column3:
ワシは ゾーラ族の王
ドレファンであるゾヨ
column4: I am King Dorephan, ruler of the Zora.

column3:
む？ リンク どうしたゾヨ？
なにやら キョロキョロしておったが…
column4:
Hm? What is the matter, Link?
You seem to be looking about
as though in a bother...

column3:
なんと ゼルダ殿の声とな…！

ゼ ゼルダ殿は
生きておられるのかゾヨ？！
column4:
Lady Zelda's voice, you say?!


Lady Zelda...is still alive?!

column3:
なんと なんと…！
そうであったか！
…100年前は
あのような結果になってしまったが
神獣の中に入り こちらの手に取り戻せば
ガノンを封印する手助けに なるやもしれんゾヨ
column4:
I do not believe it... She was alive this
whole time, just as you were!

The events of 100 years ago cannot be
altered, it is true.

But if we can regain control of the Divine
Beasts...they may yet prove useful in
sealing Calamity Ganon once and for all!

column3: さっきの鳴き声のヌシ…
column4:
The creature behind that roar
you just heard...

column3:
なに？！

オヌシ ゼルダ殿の導きで
神獣の中に入り"鎮めようと思っていたのか！
ゼ ゼルダ殿は
生きておられるのかゾヨ？
column4:
Whaaat?!


Princess Zelda herself instructed you
to board the Divine Beast and appease
it from within?
So then...Princess Zelda is still alive?

column3: ジャブフフフッ！
column4: Wah ha ha! That is a good one!

column3:
シドがゾーラの里に来てくれる
ハイリア人を探しておったが
まさか ソナタから訪れてくれるとは…
まるで何かが導いてくれたようゾヨ…
column4:
Sidon was looking for a Hylian to bring
to Zora's Domain.

And now you have come...as if led by
something.

column3: むぅう…
column4: Hmm...

column3:
リンク
ムズリはおそらく下の広場にいるゾヨ
ソナタも行ってやってくれぬか…
説得には ソナタが必要ゾヨ
column4:
Link... Muzu is most likely at the
square down below.

Would you mind going down there?
I need you to convince him to fulfill
his duty.

column3:
おお リンク！
さっき渡せなかった これを渡しておくゾヨ
column4:
Ah, Link! I was unable to give this
to you earlier, so please take it
now, along with my best wishes.

column3:
おおリンクよ
ソナタ まだポーチがいっぱいなので…
ポーチに空きを作ってから また来るゾヨ
column4:
Oh. Link... It seems your inventory is full.


Please return after you have made
some room.

column3:
そのゾーラの鎧は我が娘ミファーが丹精込めて
作り上げたものゾヨ
それを着ていればハイリア人でも
我らゾーラのように滝登りができるゾヨ
大切にしてやってくれゾヨ
column4:
My daughter, Mipha, put her heart and
soul into making that Zora armor.

So long as you wear it, even a Hylian
like yourself will have the power to
ascend waterfalls like a Zora.
Please take good care of it.

column3:
なんと ムズリのヤツめ

ソナタが ミファーの想い人であると証明せねば
協力できぬなどと言ってるゾヨか？
何かゾーラの鎧がソナタのものと証明する
方法はないものか…
column4:
Muzu... What am I to do with him?


He insists he will not cooperate unless
you prove you are the one Mipha had
feelings for.
If only there was a way to prove that
this Zora armor is rightfully yours...

column3:
神獣の鎮め方は聞いたゾヨな？
ならば東の貯水湖にシドがいるはずなので
合流して協力し合って
水の神獣を鎮めて欲しいゾヨ
column4:
You were informed how to appease the
Divine Beast, were you not? Sidon can
be found at East Reservoir Lake.
I ask that you meet up with him and do
all you can to calm the Divine Beast.

column3:
おお！思い出したゾヨか！
それは良かった良かった！
column4: You remember! That is wonderful!

column3:
いやいや！ ソナタは悪くない！
全ては憎き厄災ガノンの仕業ゾヨ！
column4:
No, please do not apologize. It is not
your fault. All of this is the despicable
work of Calamity Ganon.

column3:
ミファーの行方？
それは ワシにも分からぬゾヨ…
column4:
You mean...what happened to Mipha?
Not even I know that.

column3:
あの時四体の神獣が厄災ガノンに操られ
乗っていた英傑は閉じ込められてしまった…
それ以降誰一人として帰ってきておらぬ
神獣の中で一体 どのような事があったのか…
結果を知らぬ事が むしろ希望…
ワシらはまだ無事を祈る事ができるゾヨ
column4:
Calamity Ganon took control of the
four Divine Beasts...and trapped
the Champions inside of them.
Since then, not a single one of them has
returned. It pains me to think what must
have happened.
All I can do is hope and pray, though I
am well aware of the odds that anyone
could have survived something like that.

column3:
おお！少しだけでも思い出したゾヨか！
それは良かった！
column4:
I see! Well, even if you only remember
her a little, that is better than nothing.
It warms my heart to hear it.

column3:
ミファーが英傑に選ばれて出て行った時は
誇らしくもあったが寂しくもあったゾヨ…
それが水の神獣を厄災ガノンに操られて
あんな事になってしまって…
ワシはあの時 ミファーをもっと強く
引き止めるべきだったのかもしれん…
column4:
I was so proud when Mipha was chosen
as our Champion...but I was also quite
distressed about it.
When Calamity Ganon took control of
Divine Beast Vah Ruta...it all happened
so fast.
I cannot help but feel that I should have
tried harder to keep Mipha from harm...
I should not have let her go.

column3:
ミファー達英傑が神獣の中で
どうなってしまったのか…
わからぬ事が むしろ希望ゾラか…
column4:
What befell my dear Mipha and the other
Champions within those Divine Beasts?

Sadly, I have no way of knowing.
I can only hope that by some
miracle they are still alive.

column3:
おお！雨が止んでいるゾヨ！
リンク！ ソナタは神獣を鎮めたゾヨか？！
さすがは英傑リンクだゾヨ！
ワシにはもはや感謝の言葉しかないゾヨ！
ゾヨッ！
column4:
What is this?! The rain has stopped!
Link! Were you actually able to
appease the Divine Beast?!
Link, you are a true Champion!
I am grateful beyond words!

column3:
…ところで ワシの娘 ミファーのことは
思い出したゾヨ？
column4:
By the way...did you ever regain your
memories of my daughter, Mipha?

column3:
お前ハイリア人なのにすごいゾラな！
今までの認識を改めさせてもらいたい！
これからは他の種族とも
もっと交流を持つようにするゾラよ！
column4:
You are rather incredible for a Hylian!
I will have to rethink my preconceptions
about you people.
Yes, perhaps people who are not Zora
are not so hopeless after all! I am eager
to learn more about other ways of life.

column3:
…リンク
お前に辛く当たって すまんかったゾラ
お前も ミファー様のことを
考えてくれていたのゾラな…
元老院の面々も
ヒレを畳んで感謝しておるゾラ
ワシら老人の多くは
ハイリア人を誤解していたのかもしれぬ
むしのいい話だが もし許してくれるならば
こんなに嬉しいことはないゾラ…
column4:
Link... I must sincerely apologize for
my harsh treatment of you.

That whole time, you were thinking of
Hyrule's and Lady Mipha's well-being,
just like the rest of us.
All of the members of our council humbly
fold our fins back in gratitude, along with
the rest of our people.
Perhaps the older generation of Zora,
myself included, misunderstood Hylians
after all. It would seem so.
That said, I would be overjoyed if you
could find it in your heart to forgive me.
If not now, then perhaps one day.

column3: おお！ リンク！
column4: Link!

column3:
お待ちくだされドレファン王！ハイリア人に助けを求めるなど
ゾーラのヒレが折れるというもの！
column4:
King Dorephan! My liege!
Please do not speak so!To ask a Hylian for help... Why, the very
thought of it curls my fins!

column3:
ドレファン王は もうお忘れになられたゾラ？！
ハイリア人どもは信用できませぬ！！
100年前古代文明の力なぞ持ち出して
ハイラルを こんなにしてしまったのですゾ！
column4:
Have you forgotten already, my king?!
We cannot trust these lowly Hylians!

A hundred years ago, they abused the
power of an ancient civilization and
turned Hyrule into what it is today!

column3:
ドレファン王！！ゾーラの鎧を渡すのですか？！それは代々ゾーラ族の王女が
将来ムコになる男に渡す誓いの鎧！
ミファー様が自らの手で作られた
大切なモノですゾ！！
column4:
King Dorephan!!Surely you do not really intend to give
this outsider the Zora armor!Countless generations of Zora princesses
have gifted that armor to the one they
have sworn to marry!
Princess Mipha made that one there with
her own hands! It is far too important
to entrust to a shady Hylian!

column3:
あんまりです！
ワシは納得いきませんゾ！
column4:
This is just too much, my liege! 
I do not understand it one bit!

column3: しかも…
column4: And that is not the least of it!

column3:
しかも ミファー様まで
帰らぬ人となってしまった…
column4:
It is their fault that Lady Mipha was lost
to us...

column3:
それを英傑であったといえ なんの関係もない
この男に渡すなど なんたること！
column4:
He may be a Champion, but Mipha had
no such relationship with him. So why
should HE receive such an honor?

column3: ななッ？！
column4: What?!

column3:
ワシは ここにおわす ドレファン王より
このゾーラの里の執政を任された ムズリである
お前は ハイリア人ゾラ？！
我らの里に ハイリア人が何の用かな？
column4:
I am Muzu. I tend to the affairs of
Zora's Domain by the grace of our
beloved King Dorephan.
But wait... Are you a Hylian?
What is a Hylian doing in
our domain?!

column3:
むぅ… こんなとこまで来たゾラか
お前に用はない
column4:
Hmph. You came all the way here,
but it was in vain. I have no desire
to speak with you.

column3:
むむッ…"ミファー様は
この者の為に鎧を作っておられたとは…
column4:
Hmph. I never would have imagined
she would make that special armor
for one such as he...

column3:
あそこに見える雷獣山
そして その先端の試しの岬…
column4:
That tall mountain over yonder...
It is called Ploymus Mountain, and there
you will also find Shatterback Point.

column3:
その雷獣山には
恐ろしいヤツが棲みついているゾラ
ワシらゾーラが喰らえば ひとたまりもない
電気の矢を次々と放ってくる恐ろしい魔物…
column4:
A terrifying creature has made its home
up there.

This awful beast shoots volley after
volley of shock arrows. Even a single
one could be fatal to a Zora.

column3:
なんと言われようと このムズリ
確たる証拠がなければ断じて信じぬゾ！！
お前が ミファー様の想い人だというなら
証拠を見せてみるゾラ
証明できれば電気の矢を集める方法でも
なんでも教えてやるゾラ
column4:
Save your lies for another Zora. Without
any solid proof, I have no choice but to
assume you are a lying scoundrel.
If you are truly Lady Mipha's beloved,
then prove it!

Do so and I will tell you how to get
those shock arrows, as well as
anything else you wish to know.

column3:
んん？
服を変えてこようと ワシはお前のことなど…
column4:
Hm? You really think changing your
clothes is going to make me...

column3:
神獣を鎮めるには電気の矢が… そうさな…
20本以上は必要ゾラ
お前に集めることができるゾラか？
column4:
In order to appease the Divine Beast,
I estimate that you will need...hmm...
at least 20 shock arrows.
Do you think you can gather that many?

column3:
ななッ…！バカにするな ハイリア人！
そんな都合よく思い出したりするわけないゾラ
column4:
WHAT?!Do not mistake me for a fool, Hylian!
There is no way you remembered her
just now, when it is most convenient.

column3: ななッ…！
column4: What?! No...

column3:
生まれたての稚魚みたいにフラフラと…
ど どうしたゾラ…？
column4:
Hm? You are quivering like a hatchling...
Whatever is the matter?

column3:
ミファー様が このようなハイリア人を
想うわけがございませぬ！
column4:
How could Lady Mipha possibly have
feelings for a Hylian like him?!

column3:
現に こやつは何も覚えておらんのですゾ
このミファー様の像を見ても何も…
column4:
The facts are clear. He remembers
nothing. Even when he looks upon
Princess Mipha's statue...

column3:
とにかく このムズリ
確たる証拠がなければ断じて信じぬゾ！！
証拠があるというなら見せてみるゾラ

証明できれば電気の矢を集める方法でも
なんでも教えてやるゾラ
column4:
In any case, without any solid proof,
I cannot possibly take you at your word!

If you have any such proof, now is the
time to show it.

Do so, and...and I...I shall tell you how to
get those shock arrows! Yes, as well as
anything else you wish to know.

column3:
！！なななッ！
それはさっきのゾーラの鎧！
ミファー様ご自身が手ずから作られた物…！
なんと サイズがピッタリだゾラ！
ここッ"これは どういうことゾラ？！
column4:
Eh?!What in the... That is the Zora armor
from before!

Lady Mipha made that by hand...
and yet it fits you perfectly!

What is the meaning of this?!

column3:
ハイリア人の助けを借りるのは嫌ゾラが
仕方ありませぬ…
ワシも ゾーラの男
一度吐いた泡には責任を持ちますゾラ電気の矢が タンマリと手に入る場所
教えましょうゾ
column4:
I do not approve of asking for help from
a Hylian, but I suppose it is our only
option at this point.
I am a proud Zora. That means I must
take responsibility for my unwarranted
behavior toward you.As promised, I shall tell you where you
can collect as many shock arrows as
you will need.

column3:
そんな作り話を簡単に信じるムズリでは
ございませぬゾ
column4:
You cannot fool me with such a
fanciful lie. Not this Zora!

column3: 誰が何と言おうと…
column4: I don't care what you say!

column3:
電気の矢が欲しいなら
雷獣山に行ってみるといいが…
あそこには電気の矢を放ってくる
凶暴な魔物ライネルがいるゾラ
まあ…
命の保証は できないゾラね
column4:
If you want shock arrows, you should
go to Ploymus Mountain.

There resides a vicious beast there...
A Lynel that is known to frequently
shoot shock arrows.
Though be warned... If you go, I cannot
guarantee you will survive.

column3:
なんと…雨が止んでいるゾラ…！
ハイリア人！神獣を鎮めたゾラか？
…いや そんなわけない
これは何かの間違いかあるいは夢ゾラ…
column4:
Incredible... The rain has stopped!
Hylian! Did you really appease the
Divine Beast?
No...that cannot be! This must be a
mistake of sorts.

column3: うおおッ！"最高だゾーッ！！
column4:
WOW! That was astounding!
An absolute thrill!

column3:
見ろ！ リンク！
ルッタの放水が弱くなったゾ！
column4:
Link, look! The water spouting from
Ruta has slowed down!

column3:
ルッタが浮上するゾッ！
キミの目的は中に入ることだろう？！
column4:
Ruta is floating higher now! You wanted
to venture inside it, right?!

column3:
そばまで寄せるゾ！
うまくやって来てくれ！
column4:
I'll bring you closer! We're counting on
you, hero! Do good work in there!

column3:
リンク！本当にありがとう！
キミには感謝してもしきれないゾ！
壊滅する運命だった われらが里を
キミは救ってくれた！
さあ最上級の感謝を贈るゾ！

ゾッ！ ゾッ！ ゾッ！最高だゾッ！
column4:
Link! Thank you so much! Truly, I could
never thank you enough!

You helped save our home from
vanishing away!

This calls for a top-tier expression
of gratitude!

ZO! ZO! RA RA RA!
With all my heart...
Thank you!

column3:
リンク！本当にありがとう！
さあさあ！ キングに報告してくれ！
column4:
Link! Thank you so much! Now hurry!
You must go tell my father!

column3: ち父上…！
column4: Father... I... Thank you!

column3: リンクーッ！"最高だゾッ！！
column4: Link! This is wonderful!

column3:
事実セゴン爺がルッタの肩に
電気の矢を当てた時は確かに水は弱まった！
だが オレたちは水棲の一族…
セゴン爺とて電気の矢を扱うには限界が…
結局 ゾーラに扱える電気では足りなかったのか
ルッタの水の勢いは戻ってしまった
column4:
Seggin, who is quite shock resistant for
a Zora, hit one with a shock arrow.
Sure enough, it slowed the water a bit.
Unfortunately, as an aquatic race,
we Zora are terribly vulnerable to
the power of electricity.
Perhaps because we could not safely
strike it with enough electricity at once,
the water soon returned to its full force.

column3:
だから それならばと オレが助けになってくれる
ハイリア人探しに出た というワケだゾ！
column4:
That is why I went in search of a Hylian
who could help us!

column3:
言葉を慎め ムズリ！
リンクは オレが頼んで里に来てもらったのだ！
この大雨の中頼れるのは ハイリア人しかいない
この前 みなで決めたではないか！
column4:
Muzu! It is rude to speak that way to
your king and his guest. Link is here
because I invited him!
With such unprecedented rainfall,
we have no choice but to rely on
the aid of a trustworthy Hylian.
Have we not already discussed this and
arrived at that very conclusion?

column3:
彼なら オレ達に力を貸し
この里を救ってくれるにちがいないゾ！
column4:
He is the key to saving Zora's Domain.
I have no doubt in my mind.

column3:
もう言わなくてもわかると思うが リンク…電気の矢で カラクリを起動させてくれ！もちろん オレがサポートする
一緒にルッタを止めてくれないか！
column4:
Link, I am certain you have already
figured this out, but...We need you to use shock arrows to
get those orbs working properly again!I will aid you in any way I can, of course.
Please, hero... I beg of you. Help me
stop Ruta's rampage of destruction!

column3:
父上！
ここで姉上のことは…
リンクも混乱していますゾ
column4:
Father... I do not believe discussing my
sister is helping matters at the moment.
Link seems confused.

column3:
リンク！ ムズリは オレが説得するから
ちょっと待っていてくれ！
column4:
Link! Do not let his words concern you.
I will work this out with Muzu.
I shall return shortly!

column3:
言葉を慎め ムズリ！このタイミングで里を訪れたハイリア人！
オレは運命的なものを彼に感じる
column4:
Muzu! How dare you speak so rudely
to your king and his guest!This Hylian has come to us in our most
dire hour of need. That our paths have
crossed is certainly the work of fate.

column3:
ハイリア人の英傑？
リンクが あの英傑その人なのか？！
そうだ たしかにそう聞いた覚えが！
これは驚くべき出来事かもしれないゾ！
column4:
The Hylian Champion? You can't mean
THE Link? THAT Champion?!

So that's where I have heard your name
before! What a fateful coincidence that
we should cross paths!

column3:
もう言わなくてもわかると思うが リンク…電気の矢で カラクリを起動させてくれ！もちろん オレがサポートする
一緒にルッタを止めてくれないか！
ルッタの水の勢いが弱まれば
内部に乗り込む事も可能なはずだ！
column4:
Link, I am certain you have already
figured this out, but...We need you to use shock arrows to
get those orbs working properly again!I will aid you in any way I can, of course.
Please, hero... I beg of you. Help me
stop Ruta's rampage of destruction!
What's more, if we are able to stop Ruta,
you should be able to get inside of it!

column3: リンクにも そんな目的があったのだな…
column4:
I did not know you had such grand
ambitions, Link...

column3: よし！ オレも協力するゾ！
column4: Wondrous! Naturally, I shall help too!

column3:
暴走が止まれば"乗り込む事も出来る
リンク！一緒にルッタを鎮めよう！
column4:
Once it has stopped rampaging, you can
easily climb inside it. Come, Link!
Let us appease Ruta together!

column3:
おおッ！
君はハイリア人ではないか！
最高だッ！！なんという良いタイミングに
来てくれたのだ！
column4:
Oh! You are a Hylian, are you not?!


This is perfect!What excellent timing for you to
show up!

column3:
さあさあ父上と話してくれ！
頼みたい事があるのだ！
column4:
Come, friend, and speak with our king!
He has something important he wishes
to ask of you!

column3:
ムズリよ聞いてくれ
お前に黙っていたことがある
本人を前にして言うのも何だが リンクこそ
ミファー姉さんの想い人だったのだゾ
オレはその頃 まだ小さかったから
分からなかったのだが
父上からは何度も姉上がリンクのことを
想っていたという話を聞かされてきた
column4:
Listen well, Muzu. There is something
you need to know.

He who stands here...the man called
Link...is the one whom my sister,
Mipha, had feelings for.
I was only a child then, so I did not know
it myself at the time. But it is so.

I grew up hearing my father tell stories,
some of which were about my sister's
undying love for a Hylian named Link.

column3: そうかッ！獣人 ライネルか！
column4:
Aha!You must mean that Lynel!
He is a man-beast, that one!

column3: うむ よく聞いてくれ
column4: OK... Listen carefully.

column3:
電気の矢が20本以上集まったら
東の貯水湖で待機するオレの所に来るんだ！
column4:
When you have gathered at least 20
shock arrows, come join me at
East Reservoir Lake. I'll be waiting!

column3:
なにを言うんだ ムズリ！
大丈夫に決まってる！！
column4:
Why do you still doubt him, Muzu?
I have no doubt he will be triumphant!

column3:
よし…！
協力して神獣に挑むゾ！
column4:
Wonderful! Together we shall stop that
Divine Beast's onslaught!

column3:
本当だ ムズリ
お前は知らんだろうが…
column4:
It is the truth, Muzu. Though you never
knew it, he was ever in Mipha's heart.

column3:
これで わかっただろう？姉上の想い人が誰だったのか
誰の為に この鎧を作ったのか…！
この鎧が リンクにピッタリなのが
何よりの証拠だゾ！
column4:
Now you understand, do you not?Now you know who her heart
belonged to and who she made
this special armor for.
The fact that this armor fits Link perfectly
should be proof enough that Mipha made
it for him and him alone!

column3:
なんと強情なヤツだ…
だが証拠ならあるゾ！
リンク！さっき父上が渡したゾーラの鎧を
ムズリに見せてやるんだ！
column4:
The stubborn fool. Lucky for us,
we have proof!

Link! Go ahead and show Muzu the
Zora armor my father gave you!

column3:
どうした リンク？
大丈夫か？
column4:
What is the matter, Link?
Are you unwell?

column3:
ムズリ！
リンクの着ている服を よく見るんだゾ！
column4:
Muzu! Look closely at the clothes
Link is wearing!

column3:
昔から ハイリア人嫌いだったお前には言うなと
ミファー姉さんが口止めしていたそうだゾ
column4:
You have always disliked Hylians,
even before the Great Calamity.
That is why Mipha never told you.

column3:
さあ協力する約束だぞ ムズリ
電気の矢は どうやったらたくさん手に入る？
おまえの事だ もう調べてあるのだろう？
column4:
Now that you know, you must promise
to help him save us all, Muzu.

Please... Tell us where we can find the
shock arrows we need. Knowing you,
I bet you have already figured it out.

column3:
アイツは電気の矢を使う魔物！
ヤツから電気の矢を奪う という事だな？
凶暴だが リンクなら なんとかなるだろう
column4:
That beast does indeed wield
shock arrows. That is certainly
one way to collect them quickly.
He is vicious, to be sure. But I am certain
Link will rise to the challenge.

column3:
よし リンク早速行動開始だゾ
雷獣山には里の東の滝を登るのが近道だ！
早速 そのゾーラの鎧が役立つゾ
滝壺まで泳いで行って一気に滝登りだ！
オレは神獣のいる東の貯水湖で待機する
電気の矢が20本以上集まったら来てくれ！
column4:
OK, Link. Let's get moving. The fastest
way to Ploymus Mountain is to ascend
the waterfall east of the domain!
That Zora armor should come in handy.
Just swim to the waterfall basin, and then
go up the waterfall from there!
I'll wait at East Reservoir Lake, right by
the Divine Beast. Gather at least 20
shock arrows, and then come join me!

column3:
…！さすがだな リンク！
電気の矢を すでに持っていたか
ならば雷獣山に行くのは
電気の矢が足りなくなったらで いいって事だな
column4:
Hm?Well, well! What have we here?
It seems you already have some
shock arrows!
Still, if you need any more, you can
always go to Ploymus Mountain
to restock!

column3:
ならば リンク…
オレは神獣のいる東の貯水湖で待機するゾ！
準備が出来たら東の貯水湖に来てくれ！
column4:
Link... I'll be waiting for you at
East Reservoir Lake, right by the
Divine Beast.
When you are ready, come join me there!

column3:
電気の矢が足りなくなったら 
雷獣山のことを思い出してくれ！
だが今は準備万端…！
東の貯水湖で待機するオレの所に来るんだ！
column4:
If you run out of shock arrows,
remember Ploymus Mountain!

But it looks like you're all set for now.
Come join me at East Reservoir Lake!

column3:
なんと強情なヤツ…
だが証拠ならあるゾ！
さっき父上が渡そうとしていたゾーラの鎧を
ムズリに見せてやるんだ！
column4:
The stubborn fool. Lucky for us,
we have proof!

Show Muzu the Zora armor my father
gifted you with!

column3:
おまえは まだ気が付かないのか…
リンクが着ているものを良く見てみろ！
column4:
Have you truly not figured it out yet?
Simply take a closer look at what Link
is wearing!

column3: ムズリ…聞いてくれ
column4: Muzu... Please listen...

column3:
おお来たなリンク！
待ちわびていたゾ！
column4: Glad to see you're ready to go, Link!

column3:
グーッ ジョブだ！さすがはリンク！
さあ水の神獣を鎮めに行くゾ！
それっ！！
column4:
Wonderful!You never cease to amaze, Link!
Now then, let us go and appease
that Divine Beast as one!
Here we go!!

column3: 水の神獣の背中を見てくれ！
column4: Gaze now upon the Divine Beast's back!

column3:
ピンクに光る装置が見えるだろう？！
あれを電気の矢で射るんだゾ！
キミにはゾーラの鎧に宿る滝登りの力がある！オレがキミを神獣のそばまで連れて行く
そこの滝から飛んで狙うんだゾ！
column4:
Do you see those glowing, pink orbs?
You will need to shoot each of them with
a shock arrow!
With your Zora armor, you now have the
ability to ascend waterfalls!So I shall take you right up to the side of
the Divine Beast, and from there you can
swim up and take aim!

column3:
なんと！ まだなのか！
それは良くないゾ！
column4:
What? Not yet?! That is not a good sign,
my friend!

column3:
ゾーラの鎧と電気の矢の
準備はできたか？
column4:
Are you ready for this? Do you have your
Zora armor and enough shock arrows?

column3: キミならやれる！ オレは信じてるゾ！さあ オレの背中に乗ってくれ！
column4: I know you can do it! I believe in you!Now hurry up and get on my back!

column3:
…ん？…ちょっと待ってくれッ！
電気の矢は少なくとも4本はいるゾ！
column4:
Hm? Wait a second... You need at least
four shock arrows for this mission!

column3:
いい返事だゾ！
よし！来い！
column4: Good answer! Let's get going!

column3:
何を言うんだ！全く問題ないゾ！
よし！来い！
column4:
What are you talking about?!
We can do this! Let's get going!

column3: よし！行くゾーッ！！
column4: OK! Here we go!!

column3: 水の中なら誰にも負けんゾ！
column4: Ha! I am unstoppable in the water!

column3:
オレは全速力で突っ走る！
チャンスとみたらルッタの滝に突っ込むゾ！
column4:
I'll keep going at full speed! It's up to
you to ward off Ruta's attacks!

column3:
ルッタが こちらに反応している！
いったん離れて攻め入るスキを伺うゾ！
column4:
Ruta is responding to our presence!
I'll move away and wait for an opening
before we approach!

column3:
リンク！東の貯水湖から離れているゾ？
撤退するのか？！
column4:
Link! You are leaving the area of
East Reservoir Lake! Do you wish
to retreat for now?!

column3: さっきは惜しかったな リンク！
column4: You almost had it, Link!

column3:
覚えているか！ リンク！
水の神獣の背中を見てくれ！
column4:
Do you remember what to do, Link?
Gaze upon the Divine Beast's back!

column3: リンク！ オレはキミを信じ続けるゾ！さあ もう一度 オレの背中に乗ってくれ！
column4:
Link! I still believe in you!Come on! Get on my back and we shall
try it again!

column3: …分かった仕切り直すゾ！
column4:
OK... We shall start over when the time
is right!

column3:
よし…合流するゾ！
こっちに来てくれ！
column4:
OK... Let us regroup then!
Come on over!

column3:
…ちょっと待ってくれッ！
よく見たらゾーラの鎧を着てないじゃないか！
column4:
Wait a second... Now that I look closer,
I see that you are not wearing your
Zora armor!

column3:
…ちょっと待ってくれッ！
どちらも準備できてないじゃないか！
column4:
Wait a second... You do not have the
right armor equipped, nor do you
have all of the arrows you need!

column3:
電気の矢とゾーラの鎧がないと
水の神獣を鎮められないゾ！
急いで
準備を整えて来てくれ！
column4:
Unless you have enough shock arrows
and your Zora armor, we cannot possibly
hope to appease the Divine Beast!
Please hurry and gather what you need!

column3:
…ん？…ちょっと待ってくれッ！
電気の矢を 20本以上持ってないじゃないか！
column4:
Hm? Hey, wait a moment! You do not yet
have at least 20 shock arrows!

column3:
神獣ヴァ・ルッタは
古代の不思議な力を使ってくる！
column4:
Are you ready? Divine Beast Vah Ruta
will undoubtedly use its ancient and
mysterious powers against us...

column3:
氷のようなブロックも古代エネルギーらしい！
対処は キミにまかせたゾ！
column4:
That includes hurling giant ice blocks
that we will need to watch out for.
I shall leave those to you!

column3:
おお！ リンク！
ルッタの中はどうなんだ？
俺はリンクが目的を果たすのを
応援するゾ！
がんばってくれ！
column4:
Link! I must ask you something!
What was it like within Ruta?

In any case, I know you still have a job
to do, and I am certain you will succeed.

Give it everything you have, my friend!
